CustomField.description: Used ONLY in Reporting - For each Account it will default to "1" for the purpose of Summing Accounts. This can be done organically within Salesforce except when you the Report is attempting to Sum TWO Objects (# of Accounts AND # of Contacts) of which "Record Count" only allows ONE to be Summed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used ONLY in Reporting - For each Account it will default to "1" for the purpose of Summing Accounts. When the Report is attempting to Sum TWO Objects (# of Accounts AND # of Contacts) of which "Record Count" only allows ONE to be Summed.
CustomField.label: Unit (Inbound Item)
